message: CRITIQUE SYSTEM BROKEN: submit_critique() fails with 'no such column: final_verdict'. This proves SQLite migration is incomplete at ALL levels - not just review verdicts, but even critique submissions are broken. The entire agent-to-orchestrator reporting layer is non-functional with SQLite. System still depends on JSON registries while SQLite DBs sit empty without proper schema.

data.implication: Cannot complete critique submission through MCP
data.root_cause: SQLite schema missing final_verdict column in agents or reviews table
